a:5:{s:6:"virtue";a:17:{s:4:"name";s:6:"Virtue";s:4:"slug";s:6:"virtue";s:7:"version";s:5:"3.4.8";s:11:"preview_url";s:29:"https://wp-themes.com/virtue/";s:6:"author";s:7:"britner";s:14:"screenshot_url";s:60:"//ts.w.org/wp-content/themes/virtue/screenshot.png?ver=3.4.8";s:6:"rating";i:98;s:11:"num_ratings";i:223;s:10:"downloaded";i:2448570;s:12:"last_updated";s:10:"2023-06-15";s:17:"last_updated_time";s:19:"2023-06-15 16:15:48";s:8:"homepage";s:36:"https://wordpress.org/themes/virtue/";s:8:"sections";a:1:{s:11:"description";s:922:"The Virtue is a classic theme, built before the Gutenberg block editor was created. While some support has been added for the block editor it's a WordPress legacy theme. The theme is extremely versatile with tons of options, easy to customize and loaded with great features. The clean, modern design is built with html5 and css3 and uses the powerful responsive framework from Bootstrap to be a fully responsive and mobile friendly. Virtue has support for wide and fullwidth blocks. It's fully e-commerce (Woocommerce) ready with all the tools you need to design an awesome online store. The versatile design is perfect for any business, online store, portfolio, or personal site. We built Virtue with a powerful options panel where you can set things like your home layout, sliders, custom fonts, and completely customize your look without writing any CSS. You are going to love how easy it is to create using this theme.";}s:13:"download_link";s:53:"http://downloads.wordpress.org/theme/virtue.3.4.8.zip";s:4:"tags";a:14:{s:12:"block-styles";s:19:"Block Editor Styles";s:4:"blog";s:4:"Blog";s:13:"custom-colors";s:13:"Custom Colors";s:13:"custom-header";s:13:"Custom Header";s:11:"custom-menu";s:11:"Custom Menu";s:10:"e-commerce";s:10:"E-Commerce";s:15:"featured-images";s:15:"Featured Images";s:10:"one-column";s:10:"One Column";s:9:"portfolio";s:9:"Portfolio";s:20:"rtl-language-support";s:20:"RTL Language Support";s:13:"theme-options";s:13:"Theme Options";s:17:"translation-ready";s:17:"Translation Ready";s:11:"two-columns";s:11:"Two Columns";s:11:"wide-blocks";s:11:"Wide Blocks";}s:2:"id";s:6:"virtue";s:11:"description";s:922:"The Virtue is a classic theme, built before the Gutenberg block editor was created. Virtue has support for wide and fullwidth blocks. It's fully e-commerce (Woocommerce) ready with all the tools you need to design an awesome online store. The versatile design is perfect for any business, online store, portfolio, or personal site. Best of all, the ColorMag WordPress theme offers multiple ad spaces in its layout. So, you can monetize your website by displaying ads in these slots without any fuss. And if you plan to sell products and services online, you can rely on the theme’s compatibility with WooCommerce. TEMPLATE DEMO: https://ashe-free.wp-royal-themes.com/demo/";}s:12:"journal-blog";a:17:{s:4:"name";s:12:"Journal Blog";s:4:"slug";s:12:"journal-blog";s:7:"version";s:5:"1.0.9";s:11:"preview_url";s:35:"https://wp-themes.com/journal-blog/";s:6:"author";s:14:"themewordpress";s:14:"screenshot_url";s:66:"//ts.w.org/wp-content/themes/journal-blog/screenshot.png?ver=1.0.9";s:6:"rating";i:86;s:11:"num_ratings";i:6;s:10:"downloaded";i:30893;s:12:"last_updated";s:10:"2021-06-10";s:17:"last_updated_time";s:19:"2021-06-10 23:39:43";s:8:"homepage";s:42:"https://wordpress.org/themes/journal-blog/";s:8:"sections";a:1:{s:11:"description";s:1274:"Journal Blog is a simple but stylish Journalistic WordPress Theme for bloggers of all types. This Theme is Search Engine Optimized for easy indexing. Journal Blog is suitable for journalist, photographers, writers and authors who wish to showcase their works to the world through writing or blogging. Journal Blog is clean coded which enables your blog or website to load supper fast in any browser. Whether you are a food blogger, fashion designer, photographer or just an ordinary person who loves to write about your passion, then this WordPress Blog Theme is perfect for you. You can display a short bio about yourself on the front page to give your new readers quick idea about who you are and what to expect from your blog. Journal Blog Theme is mobile responsive in all browsers, this means your blog or content will never look distorted to those who visit your blog from mobile or tablet. This WordPress Blog Theme also takes into account those who wish to monetize their content therefore the Theme is optimized for monitization. Journal Blog Theme Customizer Options allows you to set the colors and fonts you want for your site as well as show or hide the sidebar. In the customizer Option, you can also enter your social media links to display on the front page.";}s:13:"download_link";s:60:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/theme/journal-blog.1.0.9.zip";s:4:"tags";a:12:{s:4:"blog";s:4:"Blog";s:17:"custom-background";s:17:"Custom Background";s:13:"custom-header";s:13:"Custom Header";s:11:"custom-logo";s:11:"Custom Logo";s:21:"featured-image-header";s:21:"Featured Image Header";s:15:"featured-images";s:15:"Featured Images";s:11:"photography";s:11:"Photography";s:9:"portfolio";s:9:"Portfolio";s:13:"right-sidebar";s:13:"Right Sidebar";s:13:"theme-options";s:13:"Theme Options";s:17:"threaded-comments";s:17:"Threaded Comments";s:11:"two-columns";s:11:"Two Columns";}s:2:"id";s:12:"journal-blog";s:11:"description";s:1274:"Journal Blog is a simple but stylish Journalistic WordPress Theme for bloggers of all types. This Theme is Search Engine Optimized for easy indexing. Journal Blog is suitable for journalist, photographers, writers and authors who wish to showcase their works to the world through writing or blogging. Journal Blog is clean coded which enables your blog or website to load supper fast in any browser. Whether you are a food blogger, fashion designer, photographer or just an ordinary person who loves to write about your passion, then this WordPress Blog Theme is perfect for you. You can display a short bio about yourself on the front page to give your new readers quick idea about who you are and what to expect from your blog. Journal Blog Theme is mobile responsive in all browsers, this means your blog or content will never look distorted to those who visit your blog from mobile or tablet. This WordPress Blog Theme also takes into account those who wish to monetize their content therefore the Theme is optimized for monitization. Journal Blog Theme Customizer Options allows you to set the colors and fonts you want for your site as well as show or hide the sidebar. In the customizer Option, you can also enter your social media links to display on the front page.";}}
